channel.title: SEIU Local 503 at OSU - News and Events
channel.description: Combined news and event updates from SEIU Local 503 at Oregon State University.

item.title: [Event] Purple Up Day (SOU)
item.description: Wear purple to show solidarity while bargaining happens at Southern Oregon University. Dates: May 28–29. | Date: 2026-05-28 | Time: All Day | Location: Southern Oregon University

item.title: [Event] Purple Up Day (UO)
item.description: Wear purple to show solidarity while bargaining happens at University of Oregon. Dates: May 14–15. | Date: 2026-05-14 | Time: All Day | Location: University of Oregon

item.title: [Event] OSU Bargaining Sessions (Cascades)
item.description: In-person bargaining sessions at OSU–Cascades. Dates: April 23–24. | Date: 2026-04-23 | Time: All Day | Location: OSU–Cascades (Bend)

item.title: [Event] Rally at OSU
item.description: Join us at the MU Quad to show OSU that classified staff are united for a fair contract while bargaining is happening on campus that day. Wear purple and bring your coworkers. | Date: 2026-03-31 | Time: 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM | Location: MU Quad (OSU Memorial Union)

item.title: [Event] OSU Bargaining Sessions (Corvallis) - Day 2
item.description: In-person bargaining sessions at OSU Corvallis. Day 2 of 2. | Date: 2026-03-31 | Time: All Day | Location: OSU Corvallis

item.title: [Event] OSU Bargaining Sessions (Corvallis) - Day 1
item.description: In-person bargaining sessions at OSU Corvallis. Day 1 of 2. | Date: 2026-03-30 | Time: All Day | Location: OSU Corvallis

item.title: [Event] Purple Up Day (PSU)
item.description: Wear purple to show solidarity while bargaining happens at Portland State University. Dates: March 19–20. | Date: 2026-03-19 | Time: All Day | Location: Portland State University

item.title: [Event] Purple Up Day (WOU)
item.description: Wear purple to show solidarity while bargaining happens at Western Oregon University. Dates: March 5–6. | Date: 2026-03-05 | Time: All Day | Location: Western Oregon University

item.title: [News] Bargaining Observation Time Update: 10:00 AM Moved to 1:15 PM
item.description: The bargaining observation was originally scheduled for 10:00 AM. Around 9:00 AM, management changed it to 1:15 PM. We are sending email updates and have updated the website.

item.title: [Event] Bargaining Zoom Observation
item.description: This bargaining observation was originally scheduled for 10:00 AM. Around 9:00 AM, management changed it to 1:15 PM. Please stay muted for the full session to protect bargaining privilege. Anyone joining after 1:20 PM will be removed. | Date: 2026-02-12 | Time: 1:15 PM | Location: Online via Zoom

item.title: [Event] Purple Up Day (UO)
item.description: Wear purple to show solidarity while bargaining happens at University of Oregon. Dates: February 12–13. | Date: 2026-02-12 | Time: All Day | Location: University of Oregon

item.title: [News] Show Up on Zoom: Use a 2026 Bargaining Background
item.description: A shared Zoom background is a simple way to show solidarity in bargaining sessions, protect privacy, and keep the focus on our contract. Download the 2026 pack here.

item.title: [News] 2026 Kickoff: Why This Year Matters
item.description: Join the fight for a fair contract. Recap of the Fighting for Higher Ed survey and the path to COLA and benefits. Attend the Jan 15 meeting.

item.title: [News] Fighting for Higher Education
item.description: Join classified workers at Oregon’s Public Universities in the fight for fair wages, benefit protections, and union power. Sign the petition today!

item.title: [News] Your Voice, Our Contract: Bargaining Survey Reminder
item.description: An update from the bargaining committee on the contract survey and the importance of member participation.

item.title: [News] Union Power Delivers
item.description: Victory! Your 3% union-won COLA arrives Nov 1, 2025. See the full breakdown of our last contract's wins and take the crucial 2025 bargaining survey now so we can win again!

item.title: [Event] Stewards Meeting
item.description: A monthly meeting for current stewards to connect, share information, and build skills. | Date: 2025-10-30 | Time: 6:00 PM | Location: Online via Zoom

item.title: [News] Bowling Night Was a Striking Success!
item.description: A fun-filled bowling night brought our union members together for an evening of strikes, spares, and solidarity.

item.title: [Event] Member & Family Bowling Night
item.description: Join us for a fun night of bowling, food, and community. All members and their families are welcome! | Date: 2025-10-23 | Time: 5:00 PM - 8:00 PM | Location: Lanes & Games, MU Basement

item.title: [Event] Contact Action Team (CAT) Meeting
item.description: Our SEIU Local 083 Contact Action Team meeting runs on Zoom from 12:00–1:00 PM. We discuss what is happening in bargaining and how we communicate with coworkers across all campuses to support our bargaining team. | Date: 2025-10-22 | Time: 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM | Location: Online via Zoom

item.description: Monthly meeting with updates on bargaining, events, and more. | Date: 2025-10-16 | Time: 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM | Location: Online via Zoom

item.title: [News] Make Your Voice Heard! The 2026 Bargaining Survey is Here!
item.description: The SEIU 503 bargaining survey for the 2026 contract is now open. Share your priorities and help shape our negotiations with OSU management.

item.title: [Event] CAT Meeting
item.description: Come to our Contact Action Team Meeting to get information to spread in your area! | Date: 2025-10-01 | Time: 6:00 PM | Location: Online via Zoom

item.title: [Event] Communications Team Kick-off Meeting
item.description: Welcome to the first-ever SEIU Local 083 Communications Team! This initial meeting launches our strategic focus on social media, physical media like zines, and narrative storytelling to build member power in bargaining. | Date: 2025-09-17 | Time: 6:30 PM - 7:30 PM | Location: Online via Zoom

item.title: [Event] University Day at PRAx
item.description: Volunteer with us at our union booth! We'll be connecting with colleagues and building community at this campus-wide event. | Date: 2025-09-16 | Time: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM | Location: Patricia Reser Center (PRAx)

item.title: [Event] Bargaining Confrence
item.description: Volunteer with us at our union booth! We'll be connecting with colleagues and building community at this campus-wide event. | Date: 2025-09-13 | Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM | Location: Roth's Event Center

item.title: [Event] New Employee Orientation
item.description: Welcome new members! Learn about your union, your rights, and how to get involved. | Date: 2025-09-03 | Time: 11:45 AM - 12:15 PM | Location: OSU Campus (Room shared in orientation details)

item.title: [News] Ice Cream Social Was Sweet!
item.description: Thank you to all the members, family, and friends who joined us for our Solidarity Ice Cream Party outside the Kerr Administration building!
